 2020-04042020-05-30,  ,  ,  JUS,  , 
ActContraventions Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Contraventions Regulations (Schedule XVII)
PrecisRegulations amending the CONTRAVENTIONS REGULATIONS (SCHEDULE XVII) in order to address the danger to aviation safety caused by laser attacks on aircraft by providing enforcement officers with an additional enforcement tool to improve compliance with the Canadian Aviation Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0123 Publication Date: 2020-06-10
